Our mission is the best interior design & development.

This documentation is April 2019.

Thank you for purchasing this HTML template.

If you like this template, Please support us by rating this template with 5 stars

Directories

  • css

    This folder contains all the CSS files of Constrot HTML template.

  • fonts

    This folder has all fonts used in the template.

  • images

    This folder contains all the images of Constrot HTML template.

  • js

    This folder has all javascript files for various template features.

  • plugins

    This folder has revolution slider used in the template.
